targets.expr:
count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.95
)
/
count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
)

count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.95
)

count_scalar(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
  UNLESS ON(machine) (
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.95
  )
)

panels.description: Returns a switch when more than 50% of the last 10 probes have failed.
panels.title: Switches down

targets.expr:
count_scalar(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
    UNLESS ON(machine) (
      probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
      probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
      script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
      vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.8
    )
)

probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
  UNLESS ON(machine) (
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.8
  )

count_scalar(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
)

count_scalar(
  probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
)

count_scalar(
  script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
)

count_scalar(
  vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} > 0.8 AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
)

count_scalar(
  script_success{service="ndt_queue"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
    script_exit_code{} == 5 AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1
)

script_success{service="ndt_queue"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
  script_exit_code{} == 5 AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1

probe_success{service="ndt_ssl", machine=~".*$site.*"} AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
  lame_duck_node{} == 1

probe_success{service="ndt_raw", machine=~".*$site.*"} AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
  lame_duck_node{} == 1

script_success{service="ndt_e2e", machine=~".*$site.*"} AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
  lame_duck_node{} == 1

panels.title: % of time spent doing Disk IO (sec/sec)
Top 2 (% of time spent doing Disk IO (sec/sec))
$site:  % of time spent doing Disk IO (sec/sec)
